title: 차량 자율주행 글로벌 슈퍼 스타트업 Back-end Server Engineer
content:
주요 업무
        - Collaborate with Front-end developers.- In-depth understanding of the entire web development process. (design, development and deployment)- Building reusable code and libraries for future use.- Design and implementation of data storage solutions.

업무 관련 기술 / 활동 분야
        
          Back-end
          MongoDB
          HBase
          Redis

채용 상세
        자격요건- Strong understanding of the web development cycle and programming techniques and tools.- Critical thinker and problem-solving skills.- Good organizational and time-management skills.- Understanding accessibility and security compliance.- Great interpersonal and communication skills.- Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.- (Strongly Preferred) Experience with NoSql Databases such as HBase, MongoDB, Redis.
